languages.text: "По душе ли вам молодой Гапрак? Главный наследник дворянского рода... я слышала, что дочери арх-инскрибиратора неуместно любезны с юношей".
"How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."
languages.original_text: "По душе ли вам молодой Гапрак? Главный наследник дворянского рода... я слышала, что дочери арх-инскрибиратора неуместно любезны с юношей".

traits.locale_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I have heard that the daughters of the Arch inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."
"How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I have heard that the daughters of the Arch inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."
"How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."
"How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."
"How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

languages.text: “你觉得贾帕克家族那个年轻人怎么样？他是那个家族的主要继承人……我听说，首席抄写员的女儿们与那位年轻人有着不正当的关系。”
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: “你觉得贾帕克家族那个年轻人怎么样？他是那个家族的主要继承人……我听说，首席抄写员的女儿们与那位年轻人有着不正当的关系。”

languages.text: «¿Qué opina del joven Gaprak? Es el heredero principal de una casa noble. Dicen que las hijas del Archiinscriptor son especialmente solícitas con él».
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué opina del joven Gaprak? Es el heredero principal de una casa noble. Dicen que las hijas del Archiinscriptor son especialmente solícitas con él».

languages.text: 「あのギャプラック家の若者、どう思う？ノーブル一家の正当な相続者らしいけど…アーク・インスクリビレーターの娘たちは彼にこびへつらってるらしいわね」
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: 「あのギャプラック家の若者、どう思う？ノーブル一家の正当な相続者らしいけど…アーク・インスクリビレーターの娘たちは彼にこびへつらってるらしいわね」

languages.text: "Was haltet Ihr von dem jungen Gaprak? Haupterbe eines Adelshauses ... Ich habe gehört, die Töchter des Erz-Inscribirators seien dem jungen Mann unangemessen gefällig."
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: "Was haltet Ihr von dem jungen Gaprak? Haupterbe eines Adelshauses ... Ich habe gehört, die Töchter des Erz-Inscribirators seien dem jungen Mann unangemessen gefällig."

languages.text: « Que pensez-vous du jeune Gaprak ? L'héritier principal d'une maison noble... J'ai entendu dire que les filles du maître scribe étaient prêtes à exaucer le moindre de ses désirs, et pas forcément de la façon la plus convenable... »
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: « Que pensez-vous du jeune Gaprak ? L'héritier principal d'une maison noble... J'ai entendu dire que les filles du maître scribe étaient prêtes à exaucer le moindre de ses désirs, et pas forcément de la façon la plus convenable... »

languages.text: "Genç Gaprak'ı nasıl buluyorsun? Soylu bir hanenin ilk sıradaki vârisi. Baş Yazman'ın kızları, genç adama olan düşkünlüklerini uygunsuzca sergiliyormuş diye duydum."
languages.original_text: "How do you find the young Gaprak? The principal heir of a noble house... I heard that the daughters of the Arch-Inscribirator are inappropriately obliging to the young man."

traits.locale_text: "Genç Gaprak'ı nasıl buluyorsun? Soylu bir hanenin birinci vârisi. Baş Yazman'ın kızlarının genç adamı uygunsuz şekillerde zorladıklarını duydum."
